results.title: Lisinopril reverses left ventricular hypertrophy through improved aortic compliance.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ reverses @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ through improved aortic compliance.

results.title: Lisinopril in the treatment of hypertension.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ also reduces @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ and lowers renal vascular resistance, thereby increasing renal blood flow.

results.title: Cardioreparation with lisinopril in the management of hypertension and heart failure.
results.text_hl: A regression in @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@, perivascular and interstitial @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@, and medial thickening of intramural vessels were obtained after 12 weeks of oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ administration.
